actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the hometown hero project of the Congressional Medal of Honor Society.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that individuals should: (1) participate in the hometown hero project of the Congressional Medal of Honor Society; (2) recognize the importance of the Society's efforts to make individuals throughout the United States aware of Medal of Honor recipients; (3) inspire research regarding hometown heroes; (4) encourage the placing of special gravemarkers on unmarked burial sites of Medal of Honor recipients; (5) support Society efforts to distribute information about recipients; and (6) provide the Society with information regarding recipients who previously were unknown or forgotten.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the hometown hero project of the Congressional Medal of Honor Society.
